summary: In 1973, Gamera sacrifices his life to rid the world of the Gyaos once and for all. Thirty-three years later, a small boy, whose father witnessed the 1973 event, named Toru finds a ... See full summary »
cast: Ryô Tomioka|Kaho|Shingo Ishikawa|Shogo Narita|Kanji Tsuda|Susumu Terajima|Tomorô Taguchi|Kenjirô Ishimaru|Megumi Kobayashi|Kenji Motomiya|Tetsu Watanabe|Keenan Cromshaw|Himawari Ono
title: Chiisaki yûsha-tachi: Gamera
